scripts.build-js: cat assets/js/libs/*.js assets/js/app.js > assets/js/production.js && terser assets/js/production.js -o assets/js/production.min.js
scripts.build-css: sass assets/scss/style.scss assets/css/style.css && postcss --use autoprefixer -o assets/css/style.min.css assets/css/style.css
scripts.dev: npm run build-js && npm run build-css && npm run jekyll-serve && npm run watch
